stories.Title: One more day
stories.Description: CEO Elon Musk has announced a slight change in Starship's journey due to the necessary replacement of a grid fin actuator, pushing the launch to Saturday.
stories.Tweet: One more day 📦 CEO Elon Musk has announced a slight change in Starship's journey due to the necessary replacement of a grid fin actuator, pushing the launch to Saturday. #spacex https://techcrunch.com/2023/11/16/musk-spacex-now-aiming-for-saturday-for-starships-second-flight-test/

stories.Title: Say hello to Emu!
stories.Description: Meta is proudly introducing Emu, a set of AI tools for Facebook and Instagram that enables users to alter and create both images and videos through text prompts, boosting AI-driven creativity.
stories.Tweet: Say hello to Emu! 📦 Meta is proudly introducing Emu, a set of AI tools for Facebook and Instagram that enables users to alter and create both images and videos through text prompts, boosting AI-driven creativity. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/11/16/23963999/meta-facebook-instagram-ai-image-video-editing-emu-announcement

stories.Title: It's hard to keep up
stories.Description: Despite its pioneering history in AI, Google finds itself navigating challenges in today's landscape as Gemini, its ChatGPT counterpart, has now been scheduled for 2024.
stories.Tweet: It's hard to keep up 📦 Despite its pioneering history in AI, Google finds itself navigating challenges in today's landscape as Gemini, its ChatGPT counterpart, has now been scheduled for 2024. #ai https://gizmodo.com/google-s-chatgpt-competitor-will-have-to-wait-1851030761

stories.Title: Bye-bye, Clyde
stories.Description: After a short-lived adventure, Discord has decided to deactivate its AI chatbot, Clyde. This experimental feature, powered by OpenAI, was not as popular as the platform expected.
stories.Tweet: Bye-bye, Clyde 📦 After a short-lived adventure, Discord has decided to deactivate its AI chatbot, Clyde. This experimental feature, powered by OpenAI, was not as popular as the platform expected. #ai https://www.engadget.com/discord-is-already-killing-clyde-its-experimental-openai-chatbot-155231238.html

stories.Title: A blue text bubble
stories.Description: The age-old debate between Apple and Android users over iMessage may be coming to an end. Apple's big news of adopting the RCS messaging standard is set to transform cross-platform messaging.
stories.Tweet: A blue text bubble 📦 The age-old debate between Apple and Android users over iMessage may be coming to an end. Apple's big news of adopting the RCS messaging standard is set to transform cross-platform messaging. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/11/16/apple-rcs-coming-to-iphone/

stories.Title: In order to focus on AI
stories.Description: Amazon has recently announced a series of layoffs impacting the Alexa division. The company has cited a strategic shift to better align with business priorities as one of the main causes.
stories.Tweet: In order to focus on AI 📦 Amazon has recently announced a series of layoffs impacting the Alexa division. The company has cited a strategic shift to better align with business priorities as one of the main causes. #amazon https://www.cnbc.com/2023/11/17/amazon-cuts-several-hundred-jobs-in-alexa-division.html

stories.Title: Amazon’s promising deal
stories.Description: Hyundai has emerged as the first automaker to sell cars directly on Amazon. This move aligns with their announcement to introduce Alexa Built-in apps to their vehicles by 2025.
stories.Tweet: Amazon’s promising deal 📦 Hyundai has emerged as the first automaker to sell cars directly on Amazon. This move aligns with their announcement to introduce Alexa Built-in apps to their vehicles by 2025. #amazon https://www.digitaltrends.com/cars/amazon-and-hyundai-partnership/

stories.Title: A Cyber knockoff
stories.Description: If you really can't wait until November 30 for the Cybertruck's release, there are a few options on the market that might catch your eye, including the Robotruck, which looks slightly similar.
stories.Tweet: A Cyber knockoff 📦 If you really can't wait until November 30 for the Cybertruck's release, there are a few options on the market that might catch your eye, including the Robotruck, which looks slightly similar. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/11/16/cybertruck-isnt-even-out-yet-and-it-already-has-a-knockoff-meet-robotruck/

stories.Title: Here comes Kia
stories.Description: Kia has entered China's competitive EV market with the launch of the EV5. This electric SUV has a focus on affordability and puts the automaker in direct competition with Tesla's Model Y.
stories.Tweet: Here comes Kia 📦 Kia has entered China's competitive EV market with the launch of the EV5. This electric SUV has a focus on affordability and puts the automaker in direct competition with Tesla's Model Y. #electricvehicles https://electrek.co/2023/11/17/kia-launches-20k-ev5-electric-suv-china-rival-tesla-model-y/

stories.Title: Just days away
stories.Description: In the final stretch before the Cybertruck's grand reveal, a sense of anticipation fills the air. With only two weeks left, recent videos of the truck's interior fuel speculation about its range.
stories.Tweet: Just days away 📦 In the final stretch before the Cybertruck's grand reveal, a sense of anticipation fills the air. With only two weeks left, recent videos of the truck's interior fuel speculation about its range. #tesla https://futurism.com/cybertruck-range-leak

title: SpaceX's big day, Meta introduces Emu, Cars on Amazon
description: Alright, so it looks like we've got a bit more time to gear up for the Starship launch. SpaceX is getting everything set for Saturday, so let's stay tuned and see how it plays out! Meta's diving into AI tools to spark our creativity, and their newest thing, Emu, does wonders with photos and videos through simple prompts. And hey, forget those boring dealership trips next time you're car shopping—just go to Amazon.
